input.sentences: today we took a family trip to the beach .
the kids had so much fun running in the sand .
then we built sand castles together .
we did discover some beautiful pink flowers .
before leaving i did manage to get to walk barefoot in the sand . it was so relaxing .
output.sentences: A trip with the family to the beach was in store!
When our feet hit the sand we were off and running like kids do.
Mom taught baby brother how sand castles are built.
Pink flowers for mom is what we discover.
At the end of our day, a walk in the sand was very relaxing.
